City Council

City Council Home

  • Contact City Council
    Council is always open to hearing from citizens on topics and issues of importance to them. Please feel free to email Council anytime at citycouncil@westlinnoregon.gov (Note: this email distribution list goes to the Mayor, City Councilors and City Administration staff who assist in responding to citizen inquiries and suggestions).*
    Read more
